summary: Soledad, a girl tired of being a taxi driver in Buenos Aires, travels with her car to Patagonia. She stops in a village whose inhabitants live in isolation and their only contact with the ... See full summary »
cast: Vera Fogwill|Fabián Vena|Ángela Molina|Jean Rochefort|Ulises Dumont|Pascual Condito|Lorena De Filipo|Pablo Fendrik|Rodrigo Lizarga|Mario Marquez|Gualtiero Mayer|Mario Paolucci|Sebastián Polonski|Sergio Poves Campos|Carlos Roffé|Luis Zandunga
title: El viento se llevó lo que
